item.description:
Sudbury and nearby towns!

Let’s get together for a friendly ball game (no skills are necessary). Fairbanks Community Center of Sudbury offers a great sand field, picnic tables and a huge playground for kids. Everyone is invited including husbands and children.

Friday, July 31, 6:45 pm

Fairbanks Community Center, Fairbanks Road, Sudbury (off Hudson Road and off Rt. 27).

Please e-mail me if you’re planning to come.

See you all there,
Katya

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian Volleyball in Sudbury
